segments.text: Now the coals are just right . I can start grilling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go . I made up the burger patties for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Smell the hickory chips ? They give the meat a nice , smoky flavor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take over for a while to give you a break .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry . This is a one-man job . I've got the grill just how I like it , and I've made up my own special sauce .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'll tell folks the food's ready . Come and get it ! I've always wanted to say that !
segments.speaker: S2
